Text:
Great Torrent!
By chance can you post Concrete?? :)

Thanks WheepingAngel. Concrete, like, the big rock environmentalist guy? If yes, then... yes! I already uploaded them. I'll click all the torrents over to live for a couple days to give you a better chance at grabbing them.

Len, I want to thank you collectively for all these.  Some of the underground comix were pretty lame, but many are classics, like Fabulous Furry Freak Bros. and Nard & Pat (I grabbed them).  This was one of Ellison's best short stories, hope the comic is as good.
